title: The 1990s Oscar Winners Draft. Plus: Ryusuke Hamaguchi!
description:
With the Oscars right around the corner, Chris Ryan joins Sean and Amanda to draft their favorite Oscar winners from the 1990s (1:00). Then, Sean is joined by ‘Drive My Car’ writer-director Ryusuke Hamaguchi to discuss his Oscar-nominated film (1:13:00).

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Chris Ryan and Ryusuke Hamaguchi
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
